entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
